valence.description: Valence (positivity/negativity axis), 0–800 with Z–A order (Z = most negative, A = most positive). Serialized as [class][value] (e.g. Z800).

arousal.description: Arousal (energy axis), 0–800 with Z–A order (Z = lowest energy, A = highest). Serialized as [class][value].

dominance.description: Dominance (assertiveness axis), 0–800 with Z–A order (Z = most passive, A = most dominant). Serialized as [class][value].

complexity.description: Complexity (purity/mix), 0–800 with Z–A order (Z = pure, A = max blend). Serialized as [class][value].

stability.description: Stability (variance), 0–800 with Z–A order (Z = unstable, A = stable). Serialized as [class][value].

description: EMO (prefix), then for each field: class letter + 3-digit value. Order: valence, arousal, dominance, complexity, stability. Example: EMOZ800Z750Z675Z500Z600.
